fact: The police have their own mascots! These usually vary in different prefectures! In 奈良 Nara prefecture the mascots are deer named ナホくん Naho-Kun and ナピちゃん Napi-Chan!
There are around 4 million vending machines in Japan! They vend everything from beverages, to hot meals, to ice cream, umbrellas and cigarettes!
Over 80% of Japan is mountains and almost all forests are hand planted! Which is why a lot of Japanese trees are lined up so neatly!
Japan is home to snow monkeys (Japanese Macaque) who are known to be found relaxing in local hot springs !
